qas.question: What influences popular music in Cyprus?
What are some famous Cypriot artists?
What other genres of music are enjoyed in Cyprus?
Which artists are associated with Cypriot rock music?
What are some famous metal Cypriot bands?

answers.text: Armageddon (rev.16:16), Blynd, Winter's Verge and Quadraphonic

context: Popular music in Cyprus is generally influenced by the <a0_0>Greek Laïka scene<a0_0/>; artists who play in this genre include international platinum star <a1_0>Anna Vissi, Evridiki, and Sarbel<a1_0/>. <a2_0>Hip Hop, R&B and reggae<a2_0/> have been supported by the emergence of Cypriot rap and the urban music scene at Ayia Napa. Cypriot rock music and Éntekhno rock is often associated with artists such as <a3_0>Michalis Hatzigiannis and Alkinoos Ioannidis<a3_0/>. Metal also has a small following in Cyprus represented by bands such as <a4_0>Armageddon (rev.16:16), Blynd, Winter's Verge and Quadraphonic<a4_0/>.
